ojc.bain.test

Class SynapseTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • ojc.bain.test.SynapseTest

  • public class SynapseTest
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to ojc.bain.test the behaviour of a model on a specific spiking protocol or spiking protocols over some timing adjustment.
    Author:
    Oliver J. Coleman

      • singleTest

        public static TestResults singleTest(Simulation sim,
                     int simSteps,
                     boolean logSpikesAndStateVariables)
        Test the behaviour of a model.
        Parameters:
        sim - A Simulation containing two neurons and a single to be tested. The neurons at index 0 and 1 should be the pre- and post-synaptic neurons respectively, and will typically produce a fixed firing pattern.
        simSteps - the number of simulation steps to run the simulation for.
        logSpikesAndStateVariables - Whether to log pre- and post-synaptic spikes, and any state variables for the .

      • createChart

        public static org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart createChart(TestResults results,
                                     int timeResolution,
                                     boolean logSpikesAndStateVariables,
                                     boolean showInFrame)
        Plot the results produced by the testing methods in this class.
        Parameters:
        results - The results of the ojc.bain.test.
        timeResolution - The time resolution which the simulation was run at.
        logSpikesAndStateVariables - Whether to log pre- and post-synaptic spikes, and any state variables for the .
        showInFrame - Whether to display the result in a frame.
